timeline.author: tharindu1st

timeline.message:
Add interfaces and default implementation for artifact synchronizer

Gateway artifact synchronizer will have two base extensions to
publish artifacts and to retrieve artifacts. Default implementation is
to publish and retrieve from a database.
Serialized the classes to store as a blob
Added configurations for gateway artifact synchronizer
Implemented the db publisher and retriever for gateway artifact synchronizer
Exposed default implementation of synchronizer as a service to allow additional extensions
Added a new rest API to gateway to mannually deply APIs
Changed the API deployment steps
Added a new config to read gateway label
Read label from additional properties
Minor fixes
Bumped gateway rest API version
Minor changes
Updated the interfaces with more functionalities
Added event notifier to publish and receive Gateway Publish event
Exceptions for Gateway Artifact synchronizer publisher and retriever extensions
Implemented update and delete in publisher extension
Added support to filter APIs by gateway Label
Added support to update API and delete API
Moved the deployAPI methods to gateway component
Added a new method to get the extension type
Added a new configuration to specify the synchronizer type
Added support to subscribe to more then one label for a gateway
Changed DB Schema
Added the config mapping of artifact synchronizer
Added support to publish to Gateways defined with labels
Added support to remove APIs from gateways defined by labels
Removed unnecessory envrionement name
Added support to update labeled environements from publisher
Restructured DB operations
Added default label to all the gateways
Optimized the db operations and added a new field as DTO status
Bumped gateway rest api component version to apimgt version
Added gateway rest api feature
Added artifact synchronizer tables

Added gateway artifact pulling logic to jms listener

Once a new event received the gateway lable, it will pull all the artifacts
related to that label from the storage and deploy in the gateway. Same thing
with the removing apis
Adding labels to the API object
Added a missing import
Added gateway rest api
Removed deleting the artifacts from storage
Added a new method to check whether the api is published in any of the gateways
Added support to sync API Products with artifact synchronizer
Changed the Default artifact synchronizers to only deploy if they are selected from config
Added a new resource to gateway rest api to undeploy apis from  gateway
Added few resources to gateway Reset API
Removed unused imports

timeline.message: Formatted the code
Updated the interface to reduce the complexity and increase readability
Improved with comments, meaningful variable names
Added new configurations
Changed DB column names
Added a check for the gateway instruction when retrieving artifact
Changed variable names for better meaning
Added a chack for nullity in artifact saver object
Added a new config
Changed configurations
Fix error in config mapping
Remove decoding the byte stream
Switched publish and remove gateways order
Updated gatewayExist check to work with labels

Fixes for Artifact synchronizer

1.Removed GatewayAPIDTO from the interface
2.Removed unnecessary methods in the interface and optimised db operations.
3.Changed event notifications to send only one event with all the labels of the API
Changed the version
Adding a new method to retrieve all api artifacts for a gateway
Add database entries for retrieving
Add server startup
fix test cases of publishingToGateway
Correct DB opeartion
Add method descriptions
Remove loggings
Rename method parameter in description
fix test cases
remove white spaces
Fix APIManagerComponent test case
fix test cases
fix test cases
check validation for the availability of published gateway labels
check validation for the availability of removed gateway labels
resolve review comments
Added license header
Added missing import
Removed gatewayLabel from DTO
Addressed review comments
Bumped version
Bumped version
Changed osgi service methods to add and remove retriever and saver
address review comments

Merge pull request #5 from Sarangan0219/artifact-alpha

address review comments
